name: MartialAdventures.com
tag_list: travel, martial-arts, muay-thai-thailande, brazilian-jiu-jitsu-brazil, bjj-brazil, mma-usa, mma-brazil, mma-thailand, martial-arts-vacations
description: Booking website for martial art travels
overview:
MartialAdventures.com is the first ever website for booking martial arts trainings, with or without accommodation, in the best academies and camps around the world.

The team has searched and has personally travelled to all of the locations to visit the best martial arts facilities so that users can find their perfect destination for combining training and vacation. And, depending if they want a full immersion or more flexibility, they can book classes including or excluding on-site accommodation.

When you book on MartialAdventures.com you get instant confirmation for your booking so that you can go on vacation with complete peace of mind. Plus, MartialAdventures.com does not apply any booking fees.
